name: Emoji Solitaire Free
description:
Find out and remove identical Emoji characters as quickly as possible. How fast can you win the game?

Special Awards:
Gold medal ( ~4:00)
Silver medal (4:01~6:00)
Bronze medal (6:01~10:00)

It is extremely challenging and addictive. Tens of thousands of people are playing this style of game every day.

Download now and start your challenging.

Good luck!
